scripts.build: npm run build:tokens && npm run clean-docs && vite build && npm run export && npm run docs:build
scripts.export: npm run build:tokens && vite build --config vite.config.export.mjs && cp svelte/src/mount.js documentation/docs/site_assets/blockscape/mount.js
scripts.cypress:report: ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE= ELECTRON_NO_ATTACH_CONSOLE= cypress run --reporter json > cypress/results/report.json
